text: Pramila Jayapal (; born September 21, 1965) is an American politician and activist. She is the U.S. Representative (D-WA) from since 2017. She is a member of the Democratic Party, and the first Indian-American woman to serve in the House of Representatives. She is the author of Use the Power You Have: A Brown Woman's Guide to Politics and Political Change. She wrote many bills. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Washington Category:People from Chennai Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Pramila Jayapal
